title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Plant Health
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Plant Health 

Controls) (Amendment) Regulations 2024.

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 2. The European Union (Plant Health Controls) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No.
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Plant Health Controls) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 
310 of 2021) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by substituting for the definition 
of “Commission Regulation”, the following – 

“Commission Regulation” means Commission Implementing Regulation 
(EU) 2019/2072 of 28 November 2019 (as amended by Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2020/1199 of 13 August 2020, 
Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2020/1292 of 15 September 
2020, Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2020/1825 of 2 
December 2020, Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2020/2210 
of 22 December 2020, Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 
2020/2211 of 22 December 2020, Commission Implementing Regulation

6 O.J. No. L149 of 09.06.2023, p.62 
7 O.J. No. L162 of 28.06.2023, p.6 
8 O.J. No. L162 of 28.06.2023, p.51

10 O.J. No. L192 of 31.07.2023, p.12 
11 O.J. No. L230 of 19.09.2023, p.1

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [581] 3 

(EU) 2021/759 of 7 May 2021, Commission Implementing Regulation 
(EU) 2021/901 of 3 June 2021, Commission Implementing Regulation 
(EU) 2021/2069 of 25 November 2021, Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2021/2285 of 14 December 2021, Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2022/632 of 13 April 2022, Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2022/853 of 31 May 2022, Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2022/959 of 16 June 2022, Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2023/1134 of 8 June 2023, Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2023/1310 of 27 June 2023, Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2023/1312 of 27 June 2023, Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2023/1492 of 19 July 2023, Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2023/1572 of 25 July 2023, Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2023/1787 of 14 September 2023 and 
Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2024/2004 of 23 July 
2024);”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

23 October, 2024. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine.

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give further effect to a number of European Regulations 
concerning official controls to protect plants, plant products and forests from 
destructive pests and diseases. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [581] 5
